group_1.textCenter: (Letting someone know...@Surely that's the right thing to do...)
(I remember that he sometimes told me the@contents of those books,
even though they were all difficult philosophical@books for me, so I couldnâ€™t understand them well...)

group_1.narration: It's an affirmation of what we call suffering.
"People find happiness from feeling as though@they possess the power to overcome and grow@through challenges."
I think it said something like that.

group_1.textCenter: (It sounds dangerous to be happy through@attaining power,
but I can see how overcoming something can@lead to confidence.)
(Now, what is imposed on me is the fate of@Magical Girls.)
(Suffering in silence without anyone ever knowing...)
(But if I could just break through the barrier@of being known,
then I believe that alone will surely@make me happy.)
The Yukuni City All-Stars Festival...@Let's make our breakthrough there.
